row.content: create table smp_course ( agency_percentage NUMBER(28,8),branch_percentage NUMBER(28,8),course_code VARCHAR2(50),course_name VARCHAR2(50),dr NUMBER(10,0) default 0,headerquarter_percentage NUMBER(28,8),jixiao_percentage NUMBER(28,8),pk_course CHAR(20) not null,pk_coursetype CHAR(20),remark VARCHAR2(1024),reserved1 VARCHAR2(50),reserved2 VARCHAR2(50),reserved3 VARCHAR2(50),reserved4 VARCHAR2(50),reserved5 VARCHAR2(50),shidao_percentage NUMBER(28,8),ts CHAR(19) default to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
